title: Bloody Thanksgiving
description:
Thanksgiving is a time for food and family. We also take stock of what we are grateful for. Things like if you're able to feast on good food, and be surrounded by family. But all families aren't a blessing, they can be your greatest curse. If you don't watch your back, these happy gatherings just may kill you.

First, a boring little town is a living hell
Followed by a mother's fierce protection
Then, animal instinct kills
Finally in our featured story the truth comes from beyond the grave

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
